name: Application submitted
description: The date the application was submitted
need: Users need to know when an application was submitted so they can understand when the clock started and assess timeliness.

name: Application received
description: The date the application was received by the authority
need: Users need to know when an application was received by the authority so they can confirm it entered the system and track processing start.

name: Found invalid
description: The date the authority deemed the application invalid
need: Users need to know if and when an application was deemed invalid so they can understand delays and what halted progression.

name: Found valid
description: The date the authority validated the application
need: Users need to know when an application was validated so they can see when formal assessment began and how long validation took.

name: Additional information requested
description: The date the authority asked for further information
need: Users need to know when further information was requested so they can see what triggered delays and what is outstanding.

name: Additional information received
description: The date the applicant supplied the requested information
need: Users need to know when the requested information was supplied so they can judge whether the application can progress.

name: Consultation start
need: Users need to know when public/consultee consultation began so they can assess openness and statutory timing.

name: Consultation end
need: Users need to know when consultation closed so they can understand deadlines and whether responses were in time.

name: Consultees contacted
need: Users need to know when consultees were contacted so they can confirm engagement took place and align it with consultation timelines.

name: Mayor call-in date
description: The date the Mayor called in the application
need: Users need to know when the Mayor called in an application so they can understand the change in decision route and timetable.

name: Mayor hearing date
description: The date of the Mayoral hearing
need: Users need to know when a Mayoral hearing is scheduled so they can plan participation and track key milestones.

name: Committee date
description: The date of the committee meeting
need: Users need to know when an application is going to committee so they can follow decision-making and prepare representations.

name: Withdrawn
description: The date the application was withdrawn
need: Users need to know if and when an application was withdrawn so they can stop expecting a decision and understand outcomes.

name: Time extension agreed
description: The date an extension of time was agreed
need: Users need to know when an extension of time was agreed so they can assess revised deadlines and accountability for delays.
